summary: Ysgramors REAL Soup Spoon of DEATH
descriptionHtml:
Skyrim - Ysgramor's Soup Spoon of Death MOD

This mod adds Ysgramor's "REAL" soup spoon located in Ysgramor's Tomb

- One Handed spoon - does 300 damage against Elves and turns them into goo or soup upon death.
- Two Handed spoon - instantly kills Elves and turns them into goo or soup
- Both Spoons does massive damage against Altmer, Bosmer, Dunmer and Falmers, it only does tiny damage when used against Humans and Beast races

Note: this is a joke god weapon mod so don't expect deep lore-friendly serious stuff, its just for laughs and sh1t
author: ghostrecon123
